item.title: 10 Takeaways From Week 13: Ohio State Sitting Pretty, Oregon Making CFP Push
item.description: There's no better way to start the week than by revisiting the best moments from Saturday. Here are 10 takeaways from Week 13.

item.title: 2025 NFL OPOY Odds: Jaxon Smith-Njigba Closing in on Jonathan Taylor
item.description: Could Jaxon Smith-Njigba be making a case for OPOY? Here are the latest odds ahead of NFL Week 13.

item.title: 2025-26 NBA Title Odds: OKC Favored; Nuggets Emerge as Challengers
item.description: See the latest NBA title odds, as the Joker's Nuggets have solidified themselves as the second team to beat.

item.title: Favorite 'Dogs: Back Vanderbilt at Tennessee, Cowboys at Chiefs
item.description: Will Hill is staring at an SEC disruptor and "America's Team" as his two favorite underdogs heading into the weekend. See why.

item.title: Drew Brees, Larry Fitzgerald Headline 26 Semifinalists for Pro Football Hall of Fame
item.description: Drew Brees and Larry Fitzgerald are among five first-time eligible players to make the semifinalists list of the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
